patthana16.66:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.66:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.66:1.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.66:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
